title: BBC staff in Egypt announce strike over pay, amid currency devaluation
description: Most of the staff of nearly 90 in Egypt’s capital informed Britain’s public broadcaste Wednesday that they would cease work until their demands were met.

title: Commerce Dept. blacklists firms selling U.S. technology for Chinese hypersonics
description: The Biden administration levies sanctions against an array of Chinese companies accused of reselling advanced technology to firms with ties to China’s military.

title: Blinken to travel to China this week as spy balloon fallout eases
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken scuttled a planned trip to Beijing earlier this year after a suspected Chinese surveillance balloon violated U.S. airspace.

title: Russia is ‘most significant threat’ in Germany’s new national security strategy
description: Olaf Scholz said that because of demands on public finances, Berlin would try to implement its strategy at no additional cost to the budget.

title: 59 dead, 104 rescued after boat carrying migrants sinks off Greek coast
description: The vessel was headed from Libya to Italy, Greek officials said, and sank 47 miles off the town of Pylos. Hundreds have died crossing the Mediterranean this year.

title: These Latino conservatives like DeSantis but loathe Florida’s immigration law
description: Some Floridians support Gov. Ron DeSantis but oppose legislation he's pushing that makes life more difficult for migrants.

title: China’s BYD overtakes Tesla in the EV market
description: Chinese electric vehicle maker BYD, which has just released an $11,000 hatchback, has ambitious international plans. But can it crack the American market?

title: Ukraine live briefing: Zelensky pushes tougher sanctions on missile parts after hometown attacked
description: Preventing the sale of microelectronics to Russia would be less expensive than funding air defenses, Ukraine’s president said, after 12 were killed in Kryvyi Rih.

title: Israel ramps up home demolitions to fight terror, but at what price?
description: Israel says home demolitions act as a deterrent, at a time when terrorist attacks are on the rise. Some experts say they only feed the cycle of violence.

title: 2 killed in Japan after trainee turns rifle on soldiers at shooting range
description: The 18-year-old trainee was arrested on charges of attempted murder. Gun violence is relatively rare in Japan, and firearms are strictly controlled.

title: As Kyiv’s counteroffensive heats up, Washington holds its breath
description: After 16 months of war, and with tens of billions of dollars of advanced weapons sent, Western backers need Ukraine’s forces to show dramatic gains against Russian occupiers.

title: GOP senator blocks arms sale to Hungary for stalling Sweden’s NATO bid
description: The rare move by Sen. James Risch comes as relations between the U.S. and Hungary have become increasingly combative amid Russia’s war in Ukraine.

title: Saudi Arabia’s sporting ambitions aren’t just about sports
description: The kingdom’s investments will make it harder for the world to withdraw from Riyadh’s orbit in the future.
